alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:04PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nassau and south central Camden Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yulee, or near Fernandina Beach. This storm was drifting northeast. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Fernandina Beach, Kings Bay Base and Yulee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
